resources.string:
Rigid plastics/bottles \n
Paper and cardboard (cereal/snack cardboard boxes, phonebooks, magazines, mail, office paper, newspaper)\n
Metals (tin, aluminum, and steel cans)\n
Glass (soft drink and beer bottles, wine and liquor bottles, food containers or jars)

Loose plastic bags (plastic shopping bags and stretch wrap)\n
Foam cups and containers (egg cartons, take out containers, and drinking cups)\n
Soiled food items (food soiled containers and soiled paper products)\n
Other (broken/sharp glass, fast food packaging, and plastic utensils)

Fruits and vegetables\n
Bread, egg shells, and nut shells\n
Coffee grinds, coffee filters, and tea bags\n
Leaves, flowers and tree trimmings\n
Paper without colored ink

Meat, fish or dairy\n
Fats, grease or oil\n
Cat or dog poop\n
Pesticide-treated, diseased or poisonous plants\n
Plastic, metal or glass
